parameters.description: boolean to determine whether card can be transfrormed

symbols.name: sap.insights.CardProvider
symbols.description: This class is used to provide cards to consumers like SAP Collaboration Manager. It registers itself with the cards channel and shares available cards with interested consumers. It also handles requests for specific cards from consumers. It can be used to share cards with other applications or components that are interested in them

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: unique ID to be used for registering the provider

methods.name: sap.insights.CardProvider.extend

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.insights.CardProvider with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.base.Object.extend.

methods.name: sap.insights.CardProvider.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.insights.CardProvider.

methods.name: onCardRequested
methods.description: This method is called when a consumer requests a specific card. It checks if the consumer is registered and if the card exists in the shared cards. If both conditions are met it publishes the card to the consumer. If the consumer is not registered, it does nothing.

methods.name: onConsumerConnected
methods.description: This method is called when a consumer connects to the cards channel. It checks if the card detail control is loaded, and if not, it loads it. Then it shares the available cards with the consumer and navigates to the card list page. If the card detail control is already loaded, it simply shares the available cards.

methods.name: onConsumerDisconnected
methods.description: This method is called when a consumer disconnects from the cards channel. It removes the consumer from the list of consumers and stops sharing cards with it. If the consumer is not registered, it does nothing.

methods.name: onViewUpdate

parameters.name: bActive
parameters.description: true if the home page is currently being rendered.

methods.description: This method is called when the view is updated. It checks if the home page is currently being rendered and registers or unregisters the card provider accordingly.

symbols.title: class sap.insights.CardProvider

constructor.description: Provides a communication between card providers and consumers in FLP and included iframes.

methods.name: sap.insights.CardsChannel.extend

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.insights.CardsChannel with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.base.Object.extend.

methods.name: sap.insights.CardsChannel.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.insights.CardsChannel.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initialize the CardsChannel either with the FLP message broker or an internal implementation for iframes.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.description: Checks if the broker is enabled.

methods.name: publishAvailableCards
methods.description: Send a list of all available cards to a given consumer or broadcast it to all consumers.

methods.name: publishCard
methods.description: Send a card to a given consumer or broadcast it to all consumers.

methods.name: registerConsumer
methods.description: Register a card consumer with a unique id. The consumer will be notified through its callback when corresponding messages are received.

methods.name: registerProvider
methods.description: Register a card provider with a unique id. The provider will be notified if new consumers get registered.

methods.name: requestCard
methods.description: Request a card from a given provider.

methods.name: requestCardCreation
methods.description: Request card creation to a given provider.

methods.name: unregister
methods.description: Unregister a previously registered consumer or provider.

constructor.description: Provides a communication between card providers and consumers in FLP and included iframes.

symbols.name: sap.insights.ManageCards
symbols.description: This control shows list of all user cards and allows perform actions like change visibility, change order. It also allows user to get preview of particular card, delete or copy.

properties.name: cardId
properties.description: Sets the cardId property which decides whether to render the details page or cardlist page, if cardId is provided , cardDetails page is rendered

constructor.description:
Constructor for ManageCards.

Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

methods.name: clearPage
methods.description: Function to Clear Activities like navigation, filters

methods.name: sap.insights.ManageCards.extend

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to the metadata implementation used by this class

methods.description:
Creates a new subclass of class sap.insights.ManageCards with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo.

oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in sap.ui.core.Control.extend.

methods.name: getCardId
methods.description:
Gets current value of property cardId.

Sets the cardId property which decides whether to render the details page or cardlist page, if cardId is provided , cardDetails page is rendered

methods.name: getEnableResetAllCards
methods.description:
Gets current value of property enableResetAllCards.

Sets enableResetAllCards property

Default value is false.

methods.name: sap.insights.ManageCards.getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.insights.ManageCards.

methods.name: navigateTo

parameters.name: sPageId
parameters.description: page id to which to navigate to

methods.description: Function to navigate to the specified page, if no sPageId provided navigate to CardList by default

methods.name: setCardId

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property cardId.

Sets the cardId property which decides whether to render the details page or cardlist page, if cardId is provided , cardDetails page is rendered

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

methods.name: setEnableResetAllCards

returnValue.description: Reference to this in order to allow method chaining

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property enableResetAllCards.

Sets enableResetAllCards property

When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored.

Default value is false.
